# PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionPassEntry

**Class**

An object that represents an item available to add to as a Wallet pass.

## Declaration

```swift
class PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionPassEntry
```

## Information for displaying an addable card

- **art**: An image to that the system displays to the user when they add or select the card.
- **title**: A name for the pass that the system displays to the user when they add or select the card.
- **identifier**: A developer-defined value you use to identify the card.

## Returning available passes

- **passEntries(completion:)**: Reports the list of passes available to add to an iPhone.
- **remotePassEntries(completion:)**: Reports the list of passes available to add to an Apple Watch.
- **PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionPaymentPassEntry**: An object that represents a payment card available to add as a payment pass.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- PKIssuerProvisioningExtensionPaymentPassEntry

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
